entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
